column5: Please don't turn this into a circus.... Montreal GM decided to let go coach Jacques Martin this morning... was inevitable.... This for the better... don't know   Sad but reality  NHL.com
It's about time they got rid of that Clown..  :good:

JM is/was not the problem just look at the under achieving players to see the real problem.  Just look at the contract GM`s have saddled us with; Gomez 3 more years of 7.3m, Gionta 3 more years of 5m, Cammalleri 3 more years of 6m,Plekanec 5 more years of 5m, Markov the one legged defenseman 3 more years of 5.75m  Too much dollars for underachieving players some of them should be ashamed to cash their paycheck!!!
I fully agree with you Gord... Lot's of talk today on TV that Patrick Roy is going to take over Cunneyworth.
